name: Riptide
summary: Drag a grabbed creature into nearby water
description:
You Stride up to 10 feet to enter the water, bringing the grabbed creature with you into the water.Traits

Azarketi: Amphibious humanoids who live among the seas of the Inner Sea region, said to have descended from the people of Azlant. Sometimes known as gillmen or Low Azlanti.

Azarketis craft and use these weapons.
trigger: You successfully Grapple a creature of the same size as you or smaller.
